alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Lewis and Clark (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 01 at 2:26AM MST until January 01 at 11:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, blowing snow expected. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Central and Southern Lewis and Clark County. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 11 AM MST this morning. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 6 AM this morning to 6 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, blowing snow expected. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southern Lewis and Clark
